judul: Python Regular Expressions (RegEx): Working with Text Patterns
konten: Regular expressions (RegEx) in Python allow you to work with text patterns for searching and manipulating strings...

contoh.isi:
import re

# Example of matching a pattern in a string
pattern = r'python'
string = 'Python is powerful'
match = re.search(pattern, string, re.IGNORECASE)
if match:
    print('Pattern found')
contoh.komentar: Matches a pattern 'python' in a string 'Python is powerful'.

topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan ekspresi reguler untuk mencari dan memanipulasi pola teks dalam Python.

error.deskripsi: re.error occurred due to invalid regular expression pattern.
error.solusi: Ensure valid syntax and escape characters in the regular expression pattern.

judul: Python BeautifulSoup: Web Scraping with BeautifulSoup
konten: BeautifulSoup is a Python library for web scraping to extract data from HTML and XML documents...

contoh.isi:
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import requests

# Example of web scraping
url = 'https://example.com'
response = requests.get(url)
soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
print(soup.title)
contoh.komentar: Performs web scraping using BeautifulSoup to extract and print the title of a web page.

topik.topik: Web Scraping dengan BeautifulSoup dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan BeautifulSoup untuk mengekstrak data dari dokumen HTML dan XML dalam web scraping.

error.deskripsi: AttributeError occurred due to accessing non-existent attribute in BeautifulSoup object.
error.solusi: Ensure the attribute 'nonexistent_tag' exists in the BeautifulSoup object.
